alert.note: Alert for Northern New London; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 8:21PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN NEW LONDON COUNTY THROUGH 900 PM EDT... At 821 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Canterbury to near Gales Ferry. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jewett City, Norwich, Waterford, Ledyard, Griswold, Preston, Lisbon, Sprague, Bozrah, Voluntown, Gales Ferry, Ledyard Center, Montville, North Stonington, and Franklin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southern Connecticut.

area.areaDesc: Northern New London; Southern New London
